title: How a Christian can say God does not exist | with James Fox Higgins
description:
This video is taken from a youtube discussion with James Fox Higgins for his channel The Rational Rise called "God, Pepe, & Petersonianism".   The full video can be seen here:  https://youtu.be/hfEDGWo6vNU

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings
